name: Cargo Truck Transport Mission
description:
Cargo Truck Transport Mission!!!
Enjoy different environments and difficult turns with this mega truck. The aim is to make sure wood cargo or cargo boxes are supplied in time and on the given point. You have to do truck driving with accuracy and precision as driving on difficult turns can cause crash.
Features:
• Many Exciting Game play Missions
• Amazing 3D Graphics & City Environment
• Pick & Drop to Transport Drums & Peoples
